    java.io.Serializable

    public class NPC_
extends MajorRecordNamed
implements java.io.Serializable
    An actor in the world.

    • Method Detail

      • templateTo

        public void templateTo(NPC_ otherNPC,
              NPC_.TemplateFlag... flags)
        Takes in another NPC, and assumes all the information associated with the input flags. It also unchecks the specific template flags on the NPC.

        If the parameter NPC is templated to another NPC, this function will recursively call in order to get the "correct" template information. If during this recursive call the function encounters a Leveled List on the template chain, then the function will skip assuming that flag type, and instead mark the flag on the NPC (if it wasn't already).

        If no template flags remain checked after this function has run, then the NPC's template reference is set to NULL.

        This function makes a deep copy of all templated info.
        Parameters:
        otherNPC - NPC FormID to assume info from.
        flags - Types of information to assume. If none are given, then the NPCs active flags will be assumed.

      • templateTo

        public void templateTo(FormID npc,
              NPC_.TemplateFlag... flags)
        Takes in another NPC, and assumes all the information associated with the input flags. It also unchecks the specific template flags on the NPC.

        If the parameter NPC is templated to another NPC, this function will recursively call in order to get the "correct" template information. If during this recursive call the function encounters a Leveled List on the template chain, then the function will skip assuming that flag type, and instead mark the flag on the NPC (if it wasn't already).

        If no template flags remain checked after this function has run, then the NPC's template reference is set to NULL.

        This function makes a deep copy of all templated info.
        Parameters:
        npc -
        flags - Types of information to assume. If none are given, then the NPCs active flags will be assumed.

      • isTemplatedToLList

        public LVLN isTemplatedToLList(NPC_.TemplateFlag... templateFlagsToCheck)
        Checks the NPC's template chain to see if a Leveled List is on it, and returns it if found.

        Flags can be specified if you only want to return a Leveled List if AT LEAST one of those flags is checked.
        Parameters:
        templateFlagsToCheck - Flags to consider. If none are given, then all considered.
        Returns:
        Leveled List on the template chain, if the NPC has one of the flags, and a Leveled List exists on its template chain.
